gameDetails.name: Luxor: The Gift of Luxor
gameDetails.description:
Day 1 of Brettspiel Adventskalender 2018 Promo.

This Promo is only playable with the base game.
The rules of the base game remain unchanged, except as described in the promo rules.

There are 3 new Treasure tiles and 3 new Keys have switched from the base game.
